metadata.title: Cartrade – Find Your Dream Car
metadata.description: Buy and sell cars with confidence. Get instant cash offers, browse listings, and find local dealerships.

footer.aboutText: Cartrade is the leading marketplace for buying and selling vehicles. We provide a transparent and efficient experience for both buyers and sellers.

whyCartrade.title: Why Cartrade?
whyCartrade.subtitle: The smarter way to buy and sell cars. Trust, transparency, and convenience in one place.
whyCartrade.reason1Desc: Every car on Cartrade is listed with key details so you know what you're getting. Browse with confidence.
whyCartrade.reason2Desc: Get an instant cash offer or list your car yourself. You choose how you want to sell.
whyCartrade.reason3Desc: Find dealerships near you, compare prices, and book test drives—all in one place.

hero.title: Find Your Perfect Drive
hero.subtitle: Browse thousands of verified cars or sell yours in minutes.
hero.heading: Find your next car
hero.aiDesc: Search with natural language. Describe your dream car and our AI will find it.
hero.aiPlaceholder: e.g. White Toyota SUV under $40,000, low mileage, sunroof...

empty.title: No matches found
empty.subtitle: We couldn't find any results matching your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.

promo.instantCashDesc: Receive an immediate, no-obligation offer for your car in minutes. Get a fair price and sell when you're ready.
promo.browseDealershipsDesc: Find dealerships near you and browse their inventory. Compare prices and book a test drive.

featured.title: Featured Cars
featured.noListings: No listings yet. Be the first to

newCars.title: New cars every day
newCars.checkBack: Check back soon for new listings!

overview.recentSearchesDesc: Refine your search to find the right car.

messages.title: Messages
messages.subtitle: Your conversations with buyers and sellers
messages.noConversations: No conversations yet. Contact a seller from a listing to start.

reviews.title: Why our users are choosing Cartrade
reviews.subtitle: Discover why thousands of people trust Cartrade for buying and selling vehicles with total confidence.

user1.name: Sarah Jenkins
user1.content: Finding my dream car was so easy with Cartrade. The AI search actually understood exactly what I was looking for, saving me hours of browsing!

user2.name: David Chen
user2.content: I received a competitive instant offer within minutes. The process was transparent and the payment was handled professionally. Highly recommended!

user3.name: Michael Rodriguez
user3.content: As a dealer, I find the lead management system incredibly efficient. It has significantly boosted our sales closure rate and customer satisfaction.

user4.name: Emma Thompson
user4.content: The vehicle verification process gave me peace of mind. I knew exactly what I was buying. Great experience from start to finish!

user5.name: Robert Wilson
user5.content: I found a rare vintage gem here that I couldn't find anywhere else. The communication with the seller was seamless.

user6.name: Lisa Wang
user6.content: The filtering options are top-notch. I found a fuel-efficient car for my daily commute within my strict budget!

browseBanner.title: Find your own car
browseBanner.subtitle: With unbeatable quality and the peace of mind of 7-day returns, there's simply no better way to buy a used car. Start your search today.
